definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth

sentences.english: The disagreement among the family members healed over with time.
sentences.chinese: 家庭成員之間的不和隨着時間的流逝而消失。

sentences.english: Psychoeducation also may be helpful for family members.
sentences.chinese: 心理健康教育也對家庭成員很有幫助。

sentences.english: This is a perfect place for meetings and social gathering.
sentences.chinese: 中心是各家庭成員會面及社交的最佳滙點。

sentences.english: He fought for Irish freedom, as did members of my own family.
sentences.chinese: 他爲愛爾蘭的自由而戰，就像我自己的家庭成員那樣。

sentences.english: Family members always stand by one another because blood is thicker than water.
sentences.chinese: 家庭成員都會彼此扶持，因爲血濃於水。

sentences.english: Reunions between members of divided families will also resume.
sentences.chinese: 分離家庭成員的團聚活動也將恢復。

sentences.english: Members of these families and other close contacts have been placed under medical observation.
sentences.chinese: 已對這些家庭成員和其他密切接觸者進行醫學觀察。

sentences.english: Coral reef red hind fish are a member of the grouper or sea bass family.
sentences.chinese: 紅珊瑚魚後的石斑或鱸魚的家庭成員。

sentences.english: Certain of my family members are considered uncooperative.
sentences.chinese: 有些家庭成員被認爲是不合作。

sentences.english: All family members get together on New Year'Eve to have a big meal.
sentences.chinese: 所有家庭成員聚在一起在新年團年飯。

sentences.english: The condition of two other family members was not available.
sentences.chinese: 另外幾位家庭成員的情況不明。

sentences.english: Furniture and kitchen items shared with other members of my household do not count.
sentences.chinese: 傢俱和廚房用品是與其他家庭成員共享的，不算在內。

sentences.english: You and two of your family members had severe stomachaches the following day.
sentences.chinese: 您和您的兩名家庭成員有嚴重肚子痛翌日。

sentences.english: Make career changes that may increase your income. Difficulties with female members of your family may result in estrangements.
sentences.chinese: 與女性家庭成員的矛盾會讓你們變得疏遠。

sentences.english: All the family members gather together and celebrate Thanksgiving Day.
sentences.chinese: 所有的家庭成員聚在一起來慶祝感恩節。

definition: to show concern and care for
disadvantaged social groups (e.g. the handicapped)/the economically and politically marginalized/the dispossessed
head of a household/family head/patriarch/parent or guardian of a child
